name: Get Breach Report Reviewed and Approved by DPO
description: Sends personal data breach notification to DPO (Data Protection Officer) for review and approval of Data Breach Report.

params.data:
[
    {
        "Company Name": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].companyName}}",
        "Company Size": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].companySize}}",
        "Company Address": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].companyAddress}}",
        "Company City": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].companyCity}}",
        "Company Country": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].companyCountry}}",
        "Was personal data affected?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].wasPersonalDataOrInformationInvolved | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Was the data encrypted?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].wasTheDataEncrypted | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "What was the data format?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].whatWasTheDataFormat}}",
        "What was the data source?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].whatWasTheDataSource}}",
        "Where data was hosted?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].whereDataWasHosted}}",
        "Was the exposure resolved?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].wasTheExposureResolved | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Is harm, risk or misuse foreseeable?": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].isHarmRiskOrMisuseForeseeable | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
"What mitigation actions have been implemented?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].mitigationActions}}",
        "What are the repercussions of breach?": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].repercussionsOfBreach}}",
        "Cause of Data Breach": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].causeOfDataBreach}}",
        "Type of Data Breach": "{{(vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].typeOfDataBreach | fromIRI).itemValue}}",
        "Data Type": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].dataType}}",
        "No. of Affected Users": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].noOfAffectedUsers}}",
        "No. of Affected Data Records": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].noOfAffectedDataRecords}}",
        "Affected Users Emails": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].affectedUsersEmails}}",
        "Any Additional Information": "{{vars.steps.Get_Incident_ID[0].incidents[0].anyAdditionalInformation}}"
    }
]

message.content: The Data Breach Report has been sent to DPO for reviewal and approval.

schema.title: Data Breach Report Approval

inputVariables.label: Please confirm if this is a valid breach?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: isDPIARequired
inputVariables.label: Is Data Protection Impact Assessment(DPIA) Required?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: reasonToPerformDPIA
inputVariables.label: Provide a reason to perform DPIA

inputVariables.name: impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers
inputVariables.label: What is the severity of the impact of the data breach on the affected individual?
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

inputVariables.name: measuresToReduceFutureRisks
inputVariables.label: Identify measures need to be taken to reduce or eliminate risks in future?

inputVariables.name: isReportDpoApproved
inputVariables.label: Please provide your approval to send this report to Data Protection Authority(DPA).
inputVariables.title: Dynamic List

resource.isValidBreach: {% if 'Valid Breach' == vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.isValidBreach %}{{"YesNo Picklist" | picklist("Yes", "@id")}}{% else %}{{"YesNo Picklist" | picklist("No", "@id")}}{% endif %}

steps.name: Send Data Breach Report to DPA

message.content: Created Task #{{vars.result.id}} - {{vars.result.name}} to Notify Affected Individuals about Data Breach.

resource.name: Communicate Affected Users of Breach
resource.description:
Individuals Affected by the data breach are at HIGH Risk and need to be communicated about the same

Click on **Notify Affected Users**

step_variables._temp: {% set item = vars.result['@id'] %}{% set _dummy = "|" + (item | fromIRI).name + "| [*Click Here*](https://" + globalVars.Server_fqhn + "/modules/view-panel/tasks/" + (item | fromIRI).uuid + ")| ❌|" %}{{vars.description.append(_dummy)}}

resource.content:
DPO assessment of Data Breach Report is completed.

 

DPO Assessment Summary

  • This as a Valid Data Breach Incident
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.impactSeverityOnAffectedUsers in ['High', 'Medium'] %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at High risk. Hence, need to be communicate about the breach.{% else %}Affected individuals due to this breach are at Low risk.{% endif %}
  • {% if vars.steps.Send_Risk_Assessment_Details_to_DPO.input.isReportDpoApproved == 'Approved' %}Data Breach Report has been Approved by DPO{% else %}Data Breach Report has been Rejected by DPO{% endif %}

step_variables._temp: {% set item = vars.result['@id'] %}{% set _dummy = "|" + (item | fromIRI).name + "| [*Click Here*](https://" + globalVars.Server_fqhn + "/modules/view-panel/tasks/" + (item | fromIRI).uuid + ")| ❌|" %}{{vars.description.append(_dummy)}}

message.content: DPO has confirmed an Invalid Breach. The Incident can be closed now.
